body:
So my friend was telling me how riot members play with the community for there 1000th win. I'm not sure if this is true or not but I might as-well try right?
I went on support and they said to try the forums. So.... Are there any riot members out there willing to play with me for my 1000th win? My IGN is Res. Thanks anyway if you don't. I don't really care that much I just think it would be really cool to play with riot. Proof of 999 wins http://puu.sh/ejPNX/64ddafcb24.jpg

replies.body:
I'll play! :)

Add me in game

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OO5Qfxna,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-10T20:10:15.099+0000)
>
> I'll play! :)
> 
> Add me in game

This rioter dude is a nice and generous  guy, definitely deserves honor:)
Awesome!!! Thanks a lot. I added you :D

Once i do get to 1000 wins (which isn't far away) Im not going to ask riot member to play with me purely because that will be the one game i go 0/32/1 and lose it. (even tho i totally should ask because that would just be so cool xD)

:l

Hope you had a fun game
